# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TextInputAutocapitalization] struct from a `UITextAutocapitalizationType` enum.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(_ type: UITextAutocapitalizationType)
```
